Content:: Harvey J. Kaye (born October 9, 1949) is an American historian and sociologist. Kaye is an author of several political books including “Thomas Paine and the Promise of America”, and “The Fight for the Four Freedoms”.[1] He has appeared as an expert on several political news shows and podcasts including “Bill Moyers Journal” and “That’s Jacqueline”. Kaye is a Professor Emeritus of Democracy & Justice Studies and the Director of the Center for History and Social Change at the University of Wisconsin–Green Bay. Kaye was born in Englewood, NJ.[2]  This biography of an American historian is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
